function_description: Manage board permissions by assigning different roles to members.
initial_state: The user is on the board settings page with administrative access. The board must have members that need role assignment.
steps: Navigate to the board settings page.
Locate the section for managing member permissions.
Select a member from the list of board members.
Choose the desired role from the available options: Project Manager, Editor, Commenter, Viewer.
expected_state: The selected member has been assigned the specified role, with permissions according to the role: Project Manager can manage boards and add members, Editor can create and delete tasks and lists, Commenter can view and comment on cards, Viewer can only view board contents.
